csw.util.config

Class ConfigDSL

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.util.config.ConfigDSL

  • public class ConfigDSL
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a Scala DSL for dealing with configurations. See ConfigDSLTests for example usage.

    • Constructor Summary

      ConfigDSL()

        Parameters:

        key - the key of the item to be tested for existence
        Returns:

      • get

        public static <S,I extends Item<S>,T extends Configurations.ConfigType<T>> scala.Option<S> get(T sc,
                                                                                               Key<S,I> key,
                                                                                               int index)
        Finds an item and returns the value at an index as an Option This is a shortcut for get item and get(index) value

        Parameters:
        sc - the configuration that contains items
        key - the key of the item that is needed
        index - the index of the value needed
        Returns:
        the index value as an Option or None if the item with key is not present or there is no value at the index

      • get

        public static <S> scala.Option<S> get(Item<S> item,
                                      int index)
        Returns the value for an item at the index as an Option

        Parameters:
        item - the item that contains values
        index - the index of the needed value
        Returns:
        the item's index value as an Option (i.e. Some(value)) or None if the index is inappropriate

      • vset

        public static <S,I extends Item<S>> I vset(Key<S,I> key,
                                           scala.collection.immutable.Vector<S> v,
                                           UnitsOfMeasure.Units units)
        Create an item by setting a key with a Vector of values associated with the key

        Parameters:
        key - the key that is used to create the needed item
        v - a Vector of values of the item's type that is being used to set the item
        units - optional units for the item
        Returns:
        a new item of the type associated with the key

      • set

                                          scala.collection.Seq<S> v)

        Parameters:
        key - the key that isused to crate the needed item
        v - a varargs argument with one or more values of the item's type
        Returns:
        a new item of the type associated with the key
